summary: An ordinance granting the Bon Marche Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, the right to maintain and operate until May 31, 1930, existing overhead bridges across a portion of the alley in block twenty-five (25), A.A. Denny's Third Addition to the City of Seattle, specifying the conditions upon which such grant is made, and providing for the filling by said grantee of an acceptance of such grant, a surety company bond, and surrender of rights granted by Ordinances Nos. 24712, 27622 and 38921.
